channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 09:08 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in Marganets and the Marganets territorial community are under artillery fire. Take shelter!
item.description: 游댮 09:08 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in Marganets and the Marganets territorial community are under artillery fire. Take shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 08:55 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community has been eliminated. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 游릭 08:55 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community has been eliminated. Stay tuned for further reports. #m_Marhanets_and_the_Marhanets_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 07:45 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 07:45 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 07:19 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in the city Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further announcements.
item.description: 游릭 07:19 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in the city Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further announcements. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
